value.stringValue: The Project_INV_Notify_Project_Team_on_Grant_Stages-12 invocable process failed to start because no records in your org match the record Id specified. In the entities that invoke Project_INV_Notify_Project_Team_on_Grant_Stages-12, such as other processes, check the value for this input: SObjectId.

The Project_INV_Notify_Project_Team_on_Grant_Stages-12 invocable process failed to start because a valid value wasn't found. This can happen when entities that invoke Project_INV_Notify_Project_Team_on_Grant_Stages-12, such as other processes, don't have values for either the SObject or SObjectId. For example: -An SObject or SObject ID wasn't specified. -A value might have been included, but it was null at runtime.

SOS application {!SObject.Name} by {!SObject.Applicant_Accountable_Organisation__r.Name} with {!SObject.External_Donor__r.Name} was not successful. {!SObject.External_Donor__r.Name} rejected the application.

SOS project {!SObject.Name} funded by {!SObject.External_Donor__r.Name} was implemented by implementing partner(s) {!SObject.SOS_Implementing_Organisation__r.Name}.

rules.name: myRule_1
rules.label: NA Led Grant & Status = In Identification

Flow.description: Invocable process to notify project team of stages of a Grant

formulas.name: formula_myRule_3
formulas.expression:
AND(
{!SObject.RecordTypeId} = {!$Label.Project_RT_Grant},
{!SObject.Application_Type__c} = "NA Lead",
ISPICKVAL({!SObject.ampi__Project_Status__c}, "Application In Formulation"),
{!SObject.Chatter_Post_Status_In_Formulation__c} = FALSE,
NOT(ISBLANK({!SObject.SOS_Implementing_Organisation__c} )),
NOT(ISBLANK({!SObject.External_Donor__c} ))
)

Flow.label: Project (INV) - Notify Project Team of Grant Stages

value.stringValue: Chatter Post Status Exit in Progress
